name: ddrutility
short_description:
Ddrutility is meant to be a compliment to gnuddrescue. It is a LINUX based set of utilities to help with hard drive data rescue. If you like it, please feel free to use the Donations tab above :)

version 2.7 released January 11, 2015 (minor bug fix)
  * Ddru_ntfsfindbad 1.5 released:
    + Fixed possible program crash if partition boot sector error
    + Better partition boot sector error output
  * Ddru_ntfsbitmap 1.5 released:
    + Fixed possible program crash if partition boot sector error
    + Better partition boot sector error output

Please see the Files page or the readme.txt file for the full version changes (scroll down to the “NEWS” section).

Please see the Wiki or the help files for full documentation (note that the Wiki page does not seem to navigate properly, sorry).
summary: LINUX based utility for use with gnuddrescue to aid with data recovery
